item.title: SHA2017 - Stolen Bitcoins (300pt)
item.description: Stolen Bitcoins (300pt) Reverse Description: Someone stole our Bitcoins, luckily we captured the transaction. Can you find the flag that will allow us to get them back? Files: stolenbitcoins.tgz Decoded script for convenience: script.txt Solution Opening the archive reveals a transmission file with some encoded data: 01000000000100e40b5402000000f... Since the description says this is a Bitcoin transaction, I tried decoding it with Chain Query which revealed the following information:
